result.name: her-majestys-courts-and-tribunals-service-hmcts-performance-database
result.notes: An intranet  system that pulls together a cross section of data from  a number of the  case management systems used at all the different Courts  and Tribunals  across England and Wales;  Aria, Martha, Gaps2, Crest, Juror, Care monitoring system.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: Her Majesty’s Courts and Tribunals Service (HMCTS) Performance Database

extras.value:
The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: ASBO data are published annually on the Home Office Crime Reduction website;
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/anti-social-behaviour-order-statistics-england-and-wales-2011--2

 Internal monitoring of Impact Indicators; Company Winding-up and Bankruptcy Statistics.
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/company-winding-up-and-bankruptcy-petition-statistics
